segments.text: You ’ re a wonderful person , Kathleen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And I ’ m so honored that you would want to be with me because you would never be with anyone who wasn ’ t truly worthy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I feel exactly the same way with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t , don ’ t , don ’ t , don ’ t say that . That , that makes it worse .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What ? You don ’ t love me ? Me , either .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But we ’ re so right for each other .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know , I know . Well , is there some , is there someone else ? Oh , that woman on television , Sydney Ann .
segments.speaker: S2
